timeline.title: Beginnings
timeline.description: Started learning about programming in Java and C. Later, i started learning web development, especially frontend development.

timeline.title: Created first website
timeline.description: It was simple website that I made using HTML, CSS and Netlify platform. It was at basic level of coding in HTML and CSS. The only advanced characteristic was responsive design.

timeline.title: Transition to full stack programming
timeline.description: Started learning more about backend and server side tools. Numerous libraries and technologies like Node JS, Axios, Mongo DB, etc.

timeline.title: Learning more, more, and more
timeline.description: Expanding knowledge about responsive design, servers, and ReactJS. This website is made using ReactJS and NodeJS.
